subject: Shooting (Sport)
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Sergei Martynov of Belarus maintained his status as the Olympic favorite in the 50-meter rifle prone as he won the World Cup at the Royal Artillery Barracks in London.
snippet: Sergei Martynov of Belarus maintained his status as the Olympic favorite in the 50-meter rifle prone as he won the World Cup at the Royal Artillery Barracks in London.
